io.atomix.copycat.client

Class CopycatClient.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.catalyst.util.Builder<CopycatClient>
      • io.atomix.copycat.client.CopycatClient.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CopycatClient

    public static class CopycatClient.Builder
extends Builder<CopycatClient>
    Builds a new Copycat client.

    New client builders should be constructed using the static CopycatClient.builder(Address...) factory method. 

       
     CopycatClient client = CopycatClient.builder(new Address("123.456.789.0", 5000), new Address("123.456.789.1", 5000)
       .withTransport(new NettyTransport())
       .build();

    • Method Detail

      • withTransport

        public CopycatClient.Builder withTransport(Transport transport)
        Sets the client transport.

        By default, the client will use the NettyTransport with an event loop pool equal to Runtime.availableProcessors().

        Parameters:
        transport - The client transport.
        Returns:
        The client builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if transport is null

      • withSerializer

        public CopycatClient.Builder withSerializer(Serializer serializer)
        Sets the client serializer.

        By default, the client will use a Serializer configured with the ServiceLoaderTypeResolver.

        Parameters:
        serializer - The client serializer.
        Returns:
        The client builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if serializer is null

      • withConnectionStrategy

        public CopycatClient.Builder withConnectionStrategy(ConnectionStrategy connectionStrategy)
        Sets the client connection strategy.
        Parameters:
        connectionStrategy - The client connection strategy.
        Returns:
        The client builder.

      • withRecoveryStrategy

        public CopycatClient.Builder withRecoveryStrategy(RecoveryStrategy recoveryStrategy)
        Sets the client recovery strategy.
        Parameters:
        recoveryStrategy - The client recovery strategy.
        Returns:
        The client builder.

      • build

        public CopycatClient build()
        Specified by:
        build in class Builder<CopycatClient>
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if transport is not configured and io.atomix.catalyst.transport.NettyTransport is not found on the classpath
